Oath of Nissa in CSS

For the sake of fun, I made a Magic card replica in pure CSS and some other tools. It took longer than expected to be honest, buy this was a good, entertaining way to practice code and improve myself.

Those some other tools

I took the opportunity to experiment a bit with tools speficically aimed for this project and others, such as Gulp, that I know I will use in future projects as well. All in all, hereâ€™s what I used

  • Brackets: text editor
  • Gulp: task-automation
  • Keyrune for the expansion font
  • Mana font
  • Gimp: image editing
